content.body:
Is there any movement on Contact Picker API?
And, is there any shim/polyfill for Contact Picker API that works in all browsers? Or any alternative approach?

Domenic: Just want to clarify what you mean by "blow up", in https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/9488#issuecomment-1650858581. The spec wouldn't crash, right? I think we'd just a get a network error because we'd enter #create-navigation-params-by-fetching, right?
content.formatted_body: Domenic: Just want to clarify what you mean by "blow up", in https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/9488#issuecomment-1650858581. The spec wouldn't crash, right? I think we'd just a get a network error because we'd enter #create-navigation-params-by-fetching, right?

content.body: I admit I was typing that on my phone without looking at the spec, let me try harder
Np. I _think_ regardless of whether we decide to use "is" or "matches", we end up with a network error and an error document in the document state.
content.formatted_body: Np. I think regardless of whether we decide to use "is" or "matches", we end up with a network error and an error document in the document state.

content.body: Unrelated: why is https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#concept-document-salvageable italicized (in dfn and all refs). Seems random?
